review.title: “"Fun place to work!"”
review.pros: Pros – Fun, energetic environment. Work hard, play hard kind of place. Great support to community and employs many disabled workers. Really great values and ethics as an overall company.
review.cons: Cons – Office set up in an open concept (which is great most of the time), but you don't have any privacy at all and it is loud for a position who is on the phone all the time.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
